headline: Arcellx (ACLX) Valuation Check After Wells Fargo Launches Coverage on Its Multiple Myeloma CAR‑T Program
summary: Wells Fargo just kicked off coverage on Arcellx (ACLX), zeroing in on its experimental CAR T therapy for multiple myeloma as a potential future treatment backbone and putting the company more firmly on investors radar. See our latest analysis for Arcellx. That call from Wells Fargo lands after a choppy stretch, with a 1 month share price return of minus 27.36% and a year to date share price return of minus 16.81%. However, the 3 year total shareholder return is still up 121.17%, suggesting...
